name: Projector (Heart Of Lines)
description:
NOTE: This game requires a webcam to function properly. Make sure it is functional and uncovered before starting. This game does not collect or share your webcam data with any third party, it's just to make the metaphor work. 

Projector is a short first person interactive puzzle about the ways we project onto others.

Controls: 

Supports mouse and keyboard and controller inputs.

WASD/Left Stick to move

Mouse/Right Stick to look around

Escape/Start to quit the game
